onboarding.title: Set up financial base
onboarding.subtitle: Complete 4 steps to compute correct prices

steps.title: Depreciation
steps.subtitle: Calculate the monthly fund per equipment
steps.description: Add your equipment and useful life to build the monthly depreciation fund that will be included in your fixed costs.

fields.label: Equipment & assets
fields.helper: Name, cost and useful life (months). Paste from CSV if needed.

fields.label: Default useful life (months)
fields.helper: Applied to new assets; each asset is editable.

validations.atLeastOneAsset: Add at least one asset or a total > 0.
validations.lifeMonthsPositive: Useful life must be greater than 0.

steps.learnMore: Why this matters: to ensure prices cover real equipment wear.

steps.title: Fixed costs
steps.subtitle: Sum your monthly expenses
steps.description: Enter your clinic fixed costs. The depreciation fund from the previous step is already included.

validations.somePositive: Enter at least one line with amount ≥ 0.
validations.numbersOnly: Use valid numbers in each field.

steps.learnMore: Fixed costs determine your $/min together with the next step.

steps.title: Cost per time
steps.subtitle: Define your operating capacity
steps.description: With your fixed costs and real capacity we calculate your fixed cost per minute.
steps.learnMore: This is the base for the fixed component of your tariffs.

steps.title: Break-even
steps.subtitle: Estimate your revenue target
steps.description: Use your average variable cost to estimate the monthly revenue target.
steps.learnMore: Useful for tracking your monthly progress and setting goals.

done.title: Base ready
done.body: You can now create services, recipes and tariffs. You can also import supplies or use suggested templates.

drawerTariff.title: Calculate tariff
drawerTariff.intro: Fill the minimum to get a correct price.

sections.title: Recipe (supplies)
sections.helper: If a supply is missing, create it here without leaving.

drawerTariff.notes: An active tariff (price) is required to complete treatments.
